subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Iowa’s Shonn Greene turned Thursday’s Outback Bowl in Tampa, Fla., into a farewell party, leading the Hawkeyes past South Carolina, 31-10, and announcing his intention to enter the N.F.L. draft.
snippet: Iowa’s Shonn Greene turned Thursday’s Outback Bowl in Tampa, Fla., into a farewell party, leading the Hawkeyes past South Carolina, 31-10, and announcing his intention to enter the N.F.L. draft.
